name: Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden
description: Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden is a fighting game including the most famous characters of Dragon Ball Z series. You can even play with characters from the latest movie Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection "F". 2D Fighting action: Anime-like graphics thanks to 2D effects. Hours of Gameplay: The “Story mode” follows the original story of the Manga and in the “Adventure mode” players aim to gather all the Dragon balls. A Versus mode is also part of the game to fight the computer or a friend. A huge Roster: More than 120 characters playable/assists are available. Crazy Team Battle: Possibility to choose 5 playable/assists characters for one fight. Up to 10 characters can fight each other on the screen! Strong moves: Enjoy variety of special moves depending on the situation, Ultimate Moves and Even Rush effects are more incredible than ever!
